reply.question: 1. Does the app declare the collection of data?
reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that the app collects and uses personal information such as names, email addresses, gender, country, city, state, and age bracket.
reply.reference: We collect and use information like your name, email address, gender, country, city, state and age bracket to personalise the course and communicate with you. URL: https://www.mindsethealth.com/legal/claria-privacy-policy

source_documents.excerpt:
Mindset Health Pty Ltd (ABN: 11 617 368 957) (“we”) are committed to protecting and respecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy (“Policy”) (together with our Terms and any other documents referred to on it) sets out the basis on which any personal data we collect from you, or that you provide to us, will be processed by us and how you can get access to this information. If in doubt, the primary governing law of this policy is that of the state of Victoria, Australia.
Mindset Health provides you...

If Mindset Health or substantially all of its assets are acquired by a third party, personal data held by it about its customers will be one of the transferred assets. Mindset Health will ensure that information transferre...

trusted suppliers who help us deliver the services associated with the System and we are committed to ensuring that all suppliers meet our security and data protection standards.
We may use and disclose your identifiable health information in connection with providing services, for our internal operations, which include administration, eligibility, planning, analytics and various activities that assess and improve the quality and cost effectiveness of the service that we deliver to you. Examples...

Users of the System have certain specific rights with regard to their information.

reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: The app collects data such as behavioural data, IP addresses, domain names, URI addresses, time details per visit, details about the path followed within the application, features of the browser and operating system, and other parameters about the device operating system and/or the user's IT environment.

content: Details about the path followed within the application
Features of the browser and operating system
Other parameters about the device operating system and/or the user's IT environment

reply.analysis: The privacy policy mentions collecting various types of data automatically through the app, ranging from behavioural data to details about the user's IT environment.
reply.reference: The app collects data such as behavioural data, IP addresses, domain names, URI addresses, time details per visit, details about the path followed within the application, features of the browser and operating system, and other parameters about the device operating system and/or the user's IT environment. URL: https://www.mindsethealth.com/legal/claria-privacy-policy

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the user can opt out of data collection or delete data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy explicitly states that users have the right to request deletion of all data within the system and can withdraw their consent at any time by contacting the Security, Privacy, and Compliance Officer.
reply.reference:
A user of the System has the right to request deletion of all data within the system. To request your data be deleted, please contact the Security, Privacy, and Compliance Officer. In most cases, this request will be completed within 30 days. If circumstances require a delay to this deletion, Mindset Health will notify you directly explaining the reason for the delay. Note also that in some cases, there may be a legal requirement to hold on to your data. Again, Mindset Health will notify you directly if this is the case. URL: https://www.mindsethealth.com/legal/claria-privacy-policy
A user of the System has the right to withdraw their consent at any time by contacting the Security, Privacy, and Compliance Officer. Please note that without consent to process your data, we will be unable to deliver the Claria program. URL: https://www.mindsethealth.com/legal/claria-privacy-policy

reply.question: 5. Does the app share data with third parties?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app shares data with third parties.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy states that some services provided through third-party service providers may involve sharing identifiable health information with third parties.
reply.reference: We may disclose your identifiable health information to our third party services providers so that they can perform the job that is required of them. URL: https://www.mindsethealth.com/legal/claria-privacy-policy

reply.question: 6. If the app shares data with third parties, what third parties does the app share data with?

answer.full_answer: Third parties include third party services providers such as accounting services, server hosting and email delivery providers, business associates, vendors, and other reputable companies in the industry subcontracted to Mindset Health or its corporate customers.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy mentions that identifiable health information may be disclosed to third party services providers for various purposes. These providers include accounting services, server hosting, email delivery, business associates, vendors, and reputable companies in the industry subcontracted by Mindset Health.
reply.reference: Examples of third party services providers include accounting services, server hosting and email delivery providers, business associates, vendors and other business partners and reputable companies in the industry who subcontract to us or to those of your employer as our corporate customers, where permitted by law. URL: https://www.mindsethealth.com/legal/claria-privacy-policy
